Package com.espertech.esper.ceppushsvc.client.config

Push services endpoint configuration classes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BatchedService
    Definition for a batch service that batches items until a release interval occurs or until a certain number of items has been batched, whichever comes first.
    Channel
    Configuration for a named channel, binding together a subject space and quality of service and JMS destination.
    ChannelJMSConfig
    Holder for JMS transport destination settings.
    ConfigurationPushSvc
    Push Service configuration.
    DOMElementIterator
    Iterator over DOM nodes that positions between elements.
    EsperPushSvcConfigurationParser
    Parser for configuration.
    Provider
    JMS provider configuration.
    PushProvider
    Name of the provider to use.
    QualityOfService
    Base class for quality-of-service definitions.
    SessionMgmt
    Configuration for session management.
    Settings
    Global Push settings.
    SubjectSpace
    Configuration for a subject space.
    SubjectSpace.SubjectSpaceEntry
    Single subject space include/excludes expression.
    TimerSettings
    Push services time-related processing configuration.
    WorkQueue
    Settings related to threading and work queue.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EsperPushSvcEndpointConstants
    Constants for defaults.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConfigurationException
    Thrown to indicate a configuration problem.

Package com.espertech.esper.ceppushsvc.client.config Description
